sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Payment.css'; const Payment = ({ cartItems }) => { const [paymentMethod, setPaymentMethod] = useState('card'); const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ // Billing Info fullName: '', email: '', phone: '', address: '', city: '', state: '', pincode: '', // Card Info cardNumber: '', expiryDate: '', cvv: '', cardName: '', // UPI Info upiId: '' }); const navigate = useNavigate(); const calculateSubtotal = () => { return cartItems.reduce((total, item) => total + item.price, 0); }; const calculateTotal = () => { const subtotal = calculateSubtotal(); const shipping = 99; const tax = Math.round(subtotal * 0.18); return subtotal + shipping + tax; }; const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Simulate payment processing alert('Payment successful! Your order has been placed.'); navigate('/'); }; if (cartItems.length === 0) { return (

No Items to Checkout

Your cart is empty. Please add items before proceeding to payment.

); } return (

Checkout

Complete your purchase

{/* Billing Information */}

Billing Information

{/* Payment Method */}

Payment Method

{/* Card Payment Form */} {paymentMethod === 'card' && (
)} {/* UPI Payment Form */} {paymentMethod === 'upi' && (
)} {/* COD Message */} {paymentMethod === 'cod' && (

💰 You will pay ₹{calculateTotal()} when your order is delivered.

)}
{/* Order Summary */}

Order Summary

{cartItems.map((item) => (

{item.name}

{item.category}

₹{item.price}
))}
Subtotal ({cartItems.length} items) ₹{calculateSubtotal()}
Shipping ₹99
Tax (GST 18%) ₹{Math.round(calculateSubtotal() * 0.18)}
Total ₹{calculateTotal()}
); }; export default Payment;
